0111010010110101 0010111111001100 0 -> sum: 1010010010000001, cout: 0
0011011001100111 1101111001100111 0 -> sum: 0001010011001110, cout: 1

0100100110110110 0111101111001101 1 -> sum: 1100010110000100, cout: 0
